description:
vmops._find_rescue_vbd_ref currently assumes images have a swap and just uses the second VBD device.

If there is no swap VBD we should failover and use the first VBD. Using this approach will allow users with and without swap to mount images in rescue mode.
title: Xen _find_rescue_vbd_ref requires swap
